resumeMeta.name: Prem Kumar
resumeMeta.title: Frontend Developer (Angular, React) | Power Platform Specialist

home.name: Prem Kumar
home.summary: Frontend Developer & Power Platform Specialist with 4.5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and enterprise solutions.

paragraphs: Frontend & Power Platform Developer with 4.5+ years of experience delivering scalable web applications, enterprise workflows, and responsive UI systems using Angular, React, Power Pages, Power Apps, and Dataverse.
Strong expertise in reusable component architecture, UI performance optimization, automation-driven business solutions, and clean, maintainable code.
Proven delivery of production-ready applications with focus on user experience, accessibility, and cross-team collaboration.

experiences.role: Technology Analyst — Frontend & Power Platform Developer
bullets: Developed scalable, responsive frontend applications using Angular, React, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS, improving usability, SEO, and mobile experience across enterprise platforms
Designed and maintained a shared UI component library, ensuring design consistency, modular architecture, and faster development cycles across multiple projects
Implemented interactive data visualizations using amCharts, transforming complex datasets into intuitive dashboards for business users
Diagnosed and resolved complex UI and integration issues, ensuring optimal performance, stability, and seamless user experience
Maintained a well-structured and well-documented codebase, enabling smooth onboarding of new developers and efficient cross-team collaboration
Applied advanced Angular concepts including RxJS, Observables, interceptors, dependency injection, and modular design patterns to build scalable and maintainable applications
Developed and enhanced frontend interfaces and user experiences for enterprise applications supporting an Intel client project
Built and maintained Angular-based UI components with a strong focus on performance, responsiveness, and maintainable code
Designed and delivered interactive, data-driven dashboards using amCharts, enabling engineers to analyze quality indicators and technical metrics efficiently
Created reusable and modular UI components, improving consistency and reducing development effort across multiple application modules
Collaborated with client stakeholders and backend teams for requirements gathering and seamless integration

enterpriseProjects.title: Meridian – Web Conferencing Platform
enterpriseProjects.description: Developed features including real-time chat, Q&A modules, and configurable charts for virtual meetings and webinars.

enterpriseProjects.title: ENOWA Request Tracking Application
enterpriseProjects.description: Designed and developed a centralized request tracking application using Microsoft Power Platform to manage energy-related and operational requests. Enabled users to create, assign, track, and monitor requests through structured workflows and automated notifications. Improved process transparency and turnaround time using Power Automate workflows and Dataverse models.

enterpriseProjects.title: Community Sites – Music & Scuba Clubs
enterpriseProjects.description: Delivered polished, responsive interfaces with strong emphasis on usability, accessibility, and visual consistency for community engagement platforms.

enterpriseProjects.title: Angular Design System / Seed Kit
enterpriseProjects.description: Part of the core UI engineering team developing an Angular Seed Kit / Design System for a large-scale UK healthcare program. Built Storybook-driven reusable components including typography systems, color tokens, spacing, buttons, and atomic UI elements.

enterpriseProjects.title: Client Quality Indicator Dashboard
enterpriseProjects.description: Developed a dashboard-driven application to monitor and visualize product quality metrics for Intel engineering teams. Improved data analysis efficiency through clear visual representations and well-structured Angular components.

enterpriseProjects.title: IP Comparison Tool
enterpriseProjects.description: Built UI features to compare power output and performance metrics across different platforms. Focused on responsive layouts and intuitive data presentation for complex engineering datasets.

projects.title: Prompt Library
projects.description: A production-ready full-stack platform for discovering, creating, and reusing high-quality AI prompts. Built with React, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and cloud deployments on Vercel and Render with automated CI/CD.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio (Angular)
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio built using Angular, showcasing frontend engineering skills, component-based architecture, and clean UI design principles.

projects.title: Adventure India
projects.description: A static travel and adventure showcase website built with modern HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, deployed on GitHub Pages to demonstrate layout design and responsive web fundamentals.
